abstract.t: SASL provides a method for adding authentication support with anoptional security layer to connection-based protocols. It alsodescribes a structure for authentication mechanisms. The result isan abstraction layer between protocols and authentication mechanismssuch that any SASL-compatible authentication mechanism can be usedwith any SASL-compatible protocol.This document describes how a SASL authentication mechanism isstructured, how a protocol adds support for SASL, defines theprotocol for carrying a security layer over a connection, and definesthe EXTERNAL SASL authentication mechanism.
